product_name: Rossignol TMX J4 Ski Boots - Kids' - 2013/2014
long_description: Rossignol TMX J4 junior ski boots are designed for boys developing their skills. They provide a comfortable fit and performance features with lightweight shells that are easy for young skiers to flex. Anatomic inner boots conform to the shape of kids' feet, ensuring all-day comfort. Bi-injected polyolefin shells are lightweight and easy to manage. Liners use anatomic, premolded foam to increase warmth and comfort. The Rossignol TMX J4 boots are offered in Mondo sizes 23.5- 25.5, which correspond to US kids' sizes 5.5 - 7; Mondo sizing is a standardized ski industry sizing system. Boots feature 4 buckles and a high cuff height for older kids with longer legs.
short_description: Rossignol TMX J4 junior ski boots are designed for boys developing their skills. They provide a comfortable fit and performance features with lightweight shells that are easy for young skiers to flex.
